mapper.insert:
PostgreSQL
insert into "func_roles" (uts, func_role_name, status, comment, create_user) values (#{uts,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{funcRoleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update "func_roles" set uts = #{uts,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, func_role_name = #{funcRoleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where func_role_id = #{funcRoleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select func_role_id, uts, func_role_name, status, comment, create_user from "func_roles"
